alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 29 at 9:45PM PST until January 30 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range and Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If traveling or staying outside for extend periods of time, make sure to dress in layers and cover up exposed skin. Temperatures could be lethal for individuals that are underprepared and/or not protected..
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
